Rulings.Base:
1. Both of this card's effects target.
2. If one of this card's targets for destruction is no longer on the field when this effect resolves or cannot be destroyed when this effect resolves, the other card is still destroyed.
3. If control of either or both of the targets shifts before "Scrap Dragon" resolves, the targets are still destroyed.
4. [FORUM] In order for the 2nd effect of "Scrap Dragon" to activate, you must be both the owner and controller of the card when it is sent to the GY.
5. [FORUM] You are able to select a Token for the destruction effect of "Scrap Dragon".

PSCT.Base:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn: You can target 1 card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. When this card in your possession is destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your GY: Target 1 non-Synchro "Scrap" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.
